portfolio-item.name: exeanime
portfolio-item.summary: A design for an anime-themed website that never launched. The site owner was a friend of mine (i.e., broke teenager without the means to pay).

narrative.p: This site and its name were heavily inspired by Mega Man Battle Network series, which around the time my friend pitched the site to me was blowing up in popularity online.
At this time, I was learning about advanced CSS 2.0 techniques.
